snippet: Dr. Eric Manheimer sees Bellevue Hospital Center as a refuge, a place where those who fear they have exhausted all their options in life often find hope and a last chance at redemption.
abstract: Dr Eric Manheimer , former medical director at Bellevue Hospital Center, comments on book Twelve Patients: Life and Death at Bellevue Hospital, in which he followed the personal stories of patients who fascinated him.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Eric Manheimer sees Bellevue Hospital Center as a refuge, a place where those who fear they have exhausted all their options in life often find hope and a last chance at redemption.
